programme.desc: George meets Amin and Amifa, whose 1920s house in Bellingham, south east London, is not just ugly - the propertys DIY extension added by former owners has been condemned. The makeshift kitchen is an accident waiting to happen. The living room is dark and dingy and misaligned windows are not doing anything for its kerb appeal. Enter architect Carl Turner, who has a modest budget of £80,000 to transform this monstrosity. Can he create a contemporary, spacious and adaptable home for this rapidly growing family?

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.sub-title: Ambulance Ski Chalet and Oil Rig Lifeboat
programme.desc: Architect George Clarke meets Kay from Stockport, Greater Manchester, who breathes life back into an ambulance as she turns it into a ski chalet on wheels. An oil rig lifeboat owner tries to get his build shipshape and plush enough to convince his partner to move on board. Plus, George and contributor Will Hardie indulge in a slice of Africa in the Midlands, and Will visits an awe-inspiring Thomas Heatherwick building in Leeds that puts nature at its very heart

programme.title: George Clarkes Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George Clarke helps more people make their period homes fit for modern life. On a cobbled street in Cheshire sits a Georgian town house that could be straight out of a Dickens novel. It may look very 18th-century on the outside, but inside George discovers that its a 1980s horror show, having been stripped of its original features. It does have one unique feature, though - a first-floor conservatory on stilts. Can he find a way of getting its grandeur back? George also has his work cut out tackling a 380-year-old Jacobean cottage

programme.title: Love It or List It New Zealand
programme.desc: Hayley and Craig Monk live in Devonport, a suburb with a seaside-holiday feeling, just across the harbour from central Auckland. Built by Craigs grandfather, the Monks solid brick and tile home has housed four generations of their family. When Craig and Hayley moved in, the house had been largely untouched since the 1950s. But its old-school layout disconnects the family - including their two young sons - and almost ignores the large, sunny back garden. Alexs saving grace is a very healthy renovation budget. But shell need every cent to turn this house into a modern home that flows. And halfway through the renovation, a spanner in the works alters everything that Alex has planned. Paul is feeling confident when Hayley and Craig reveal their budget for the property search, which may be enough to find them the perfect, modern family home. Will the Monks decide to love their home or list it?

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Documentary following life inside one of Britains busiest AandE departments at Kings College Hospital in south London. programme.desc: Documentary telling the epic 50-year story of an Indian tiger clan and its five most charismatic and powerful tigresses, who have revealed more about the lives of tigers than anyone thought possible. Their home is Ranthambhore in the northwestern Indian.state of Rajasthan, which is dominated by a huge, ancient fort and three crocodile-filled lakes teeming with tiger prey. Valmik Thapar has dedicated his life to following the big cats, witnessing some of the most remarkable tiger behaviour ever seen and filmed

programme.title: Ukraine 1933: Seeds of Hunger

programme.desc: Molly returns from holiday determined to put the sad demise of Hector behind her and look to the future. Meanwhile, Archie attempts to restore Glenbogle to its former glory by sinking vast amounts of money into creating a wolf park, a change that angers Golly, who does not want to see an end to the estates traditional sports. The appointment of a new housekeeper infuriates Lexie, who desperately wants to retain her role, prompting her to challenge the newcomer to a cookery competition. Susan Hampshire stars

programme.title: Equator from the Air
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan explores equatorial regions in the Pacific, visiting some of the worlds richest marine habitats. In the Galapagos Islands, Gordon discovers how drones are helping to protect wildlife including baby hammerhead sharks and iconic giant tortoises, while a mysterious tropical lake provides clues to the future of coral reefs

programme.title: Wild Brazil
programme.desc: The animal families face the formidable monsoon rains and the giant otter cubs must watch out for predatory jaguars and learn to swim before their river floods. The coatis have to eat as much as they can ahead of their habitat disappearing underwater, while the youngest capuchin monkey needs to master some clever survival skills. Stephen Mangan narrates

programme.title: Earths Great Seasons
programme.desc: The arrival of autumn sees chipmunks and beavers stash their winter supplies, animals from musk oxen to beetles battling for mates and gannet chicks facing lifes first challenges

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan, Anna Dimitriadis and Vianet Djenguet embark on a six-month expedition following lions, leopards and cheetahs in Botswanas Okavango Delta. Gordon films one of the largest lion prides in Africa as they hunt to feed 28 hungry mouths, while Anna tracks down the regions most elusive big cat, the cheetah. Local wildlife film-maker Brad Bestelink reunites with his favourite leopardess Xudum, but a huge wildfire threatens the resident big cats, and the team

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: The series concludes with a look at the work of people striving to protect Asias endangered wildlife, and what routes conservation could take in the future. In Japan, scientists take pregnant sharks, killed accidentally in fishing nets, and rescue their unborn young in an incubating system that simulates a womb. The programme also visits a village that used to be a hotbed of poaching and is now a centre for bird tourism

programme.title: The Americas
programme.desc: Documentary showcasing the wonders, secrets and fragilities of the American continents, beginning with the creatures that live along North Americas Atlantic coast, from the wild horses of Chesapeake Bay and the young raccooon learning the challenges of urban survival in New York City to the young black bears foraging in the Appalachian forests. Up in the air, bald eagles chase ospreys for a hard-won meal, while beneath the waters sand tiger sharks act as unlikely guardians for schools of scad fish. Narrated by Tom Hanks

programme.title: Rush
programme.desc: The 1976 Formula 1 Championship season is dominated by a fierce rivalry between two contrasting drivers, as daredevil English driver James Hunt and methodical Austrian defending champion Niki Lauda put their lives on the line to outdo each other on the track. Fact-based drama, starring Chris Hemsworth and Daniel Bruhl, with Olivia Wilde and Alexandra Maria Lara

programme.title: Andrew Tate: The Man Who Groomed the World?
programme.desc: Reporter Matt Shea uncovers the truth behind kickboxer-turned-online influencer Andrew Tate and his secretive, all-male society, the War Room. Through interviews with alleged victims, internal whistleblowers and Tate himself, this four-year-long investigation uncovers that Tates cult-like organisation has been grooming scores of women into online sex work through seduction, manipulation and what it sees as psychological conditioning. The film also confronts the mysterious mastermind behind the organisation, who helped craft Tate into a global figurehead while remaining in the shadows

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: Helen is pressured to rethink the format of her new show when its launch day coincides with news of an Alaskan oil spill. To make matters worse, she faces a brutal act of sabotage from Lindsay. Dale tries to land an interview with the prime minister. Newsroom drama, starring Anna Torv, Sam Reid and William McInnes

programme.title: Matthew Bournes Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: In a castle high on a hill lives a boy, who was created by an eccentric inventor and left alone and unfinished with only scissors for hands when the man died. Then a kindly woman invites him to live with her suburban family and Edward tries to find his place in a well-meaning community that struggles to see past his curious appearance. Contemporary dance adaptation of Tim Burtons 1990 film by the New Adventures theatre company, featuring the music of Danny Elfman and Terry Davies

programme.title: The Great Dictator
programme.desc: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from the repressive regime. Comedy, starring Charlie Chaplin and Paulette Goddard

programme.title: The Sound of Music - Live!
programme.desc: Adaptation of Rodgers and Hammersteins musical, originally broadcast live on US TV from Grumman Studios in Bethpage, New York, in December 2013. In 1930s Austria, novice nun Maria leaves her convent to become the governess to the seven children of widowed naval captain Georg von Trapp. As she brings joy to a family previously beset by grief and ruled by strict discipline, she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Country singer Carrie Underwood takes the lead role, alongside Stephen Moyer (True Blood), Christian Borle (Smash) and Audra McDonald (Private Practice)

programme.title: Queen: Live at the Rainbow
programme.desc: A 1974 concert by the rock band at Londons Rainbow Theatre, featuring performances of Killer Queen and Seven Seas of Rhye

programme.title: Queen: Is This the Real Life?
programme.desc: Documentary looking at the extraordinary career of the British rock band, whose music has ensured a legacy that has lived on long after the death of charismatic frontman Freddie Mercury in 1991

programme.title: Queen - Live at Wembley Stadium
programme.desc: A performance by the band recorded on their 1986 Magic tour, when they were riding the crest of a wave following their triumphant Live Aid performance at the same venue the year before. Including renditions of classic hits Bohemian Rhapsody, I Want to Break Free, We Will Rock You and Radio Ga Ga

programme.title: Queen - The Magic Years
programme.desc: Documentary about the rock groups rise to fame and eventual superstardom, including profiles of the members who made the band a success

programme.title: Johnson and Knopflers Music Legends
programme.desc: AC/DCs Brian Johnson and Mark Knopfler of Dire Straits are joined by guests to share stories from their own careers and discuss the tracks that shaped them as musicians and fans. On the first edition, Tom Jones shares captivating stories from his career, including his friendship with Elvis Presley

programme.title: The Great Songwriters
programme.desc: Emeli Sande talks about songwriting and her life in music, and performs a selection of tracks

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the success of Duran Durans album Rio, which propelled the band into the limelight during the 1980s with its optimistic feel against a backdrop of mass unemployment and the Falklands War. Featuring interviews with original members of the band including Simon Le Bon and Nick Rhodes, as well as contributions by Bob Geldof and Anthony Price

programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: The career of the American rock and pop group who rose to stardom with their happy, fun-loving songs that were filled with beautiful harmonies

programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: Music critics discuss the rise of the band, who were put together for a TV show and had hits including Im a Believer and Daydream Believer

programme.title: Bregenz: Madama Butterfly
programme.desc: A production of Puccinis opera

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: An echo from the past comes back to haunt a ruthless executive, and his wife becomes suspicious

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Colonel George Peregrines comfortable life is disturbed when his wife writes a raunchy novel that becomes a best-seller and he becomes convinced she is having an affair. With Joss Ackland, Pauline Collins, Rupert Frazer and Gareth Thomas

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A surgeon saves the life of a wealthy patient and receives a wonderful gift - but his new asset proves a fearful liability. Starring John Alderton and Alison Fiske

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: When the new vicar of a church plans radical changes, conflict arises over a secret one of the locals has kept for years

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A fencing contest in London lands naive Nicholas Lillie in the middle of a bizarre adventure. Drama, with Benedict Taylor and Jim Broadbent

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A woman runs a psychic scam with hidden speakers to make people believe she can contact their dead love ones. One man believes she really has contacted his dead son, so becomes dangerously obsessed with her sessions. Drama, with Kim Hunter and John Larkin

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A farmer buys a strange jar at a carnival. His wife is scared of it, but townspeople come from miles to see it - and finder Charlie becomes a local celebrity. Drama, starring Pat Buttram and Collin Wilcox

programme.title: English National Ballet in Paris
programme.desc: Documentary following the ENB as the company prepared for its first visit to the Paris Opera for performances of Le Corsaire on this world-renowned stage

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of the American actor, who starred in The Big Lebowski, Tron and True Grit and won an Oscar for his performance in Crazy Heart

programme.title: Blind Eye Artist
programme.desc: Documentary telling the origin story of self-taught artist and painter Justin Wadlington, who is blind in his left eye

programme.title: The Genesis Songbook
programme.desc: Members of the rock group choose their favourite songs from the bands back catalogue, including I Cant Dance, Follow You Follow Me and The Lamb Lies Down on Broadway

programme.title: Marillion: All One Tonight
programme.desc: A 2017 concert at Londons Royal Albert Hall in which the band played their acclaimed 2016 album FEAR (F*** Everyone and Run) in full, along with a selection of classics

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend a Broken Heart
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the history of the group, featuring contributions from surviving member Barry Gibb as well as archive interviews with his brothers Robin and Maurice

programme.title: The Sky Arts Awards
programme.desc: Comedian Bill Bailey hosts the ceremony from Londons Roundhouse, honouring excellence in dance, theatre, pop, TV drama, film, classical music, literature, poetry, opera, comedy and visual arts. Nominees include David Byrne, Jamie Hale and Barnsley-based company LUNG in the theatre category while the popular music category consists of nominees Charli xcx, Kneecap and Lola Young. The Literature category celebrates the work of Alan Hollinghurst, Gwyneth Lewis and Sally Rooney and shortlisted in the television category are Adolescence, Mr Loverman and Rivals

programme.title: Gary Numan Resurrection
programme.desc: A profile of the musician, following him as he prepares to play at Wembley Arena for the first time in 40 years. With Dave Grohl, Jean-Michel Jarre, Trent Reznor and Hans Zimmer

programme.title: Greatest Albums Live
programme.desc: Accompanied by the Southbank Sinfonia at the London Palladium, pop band ABC perform and discuss The Lexicon of Love, one of the 1980s most successful debut albums

programme.title: Led Zeppelin: In the Light
programme.desc: Documentary about the rock band, beginning with the groups formation, the backgrounds of the four members and the recording and release of their first album Led Zeppelin

programme.title: The Great Songwriters
programme.desc: Paul Heaton of the Housemartins and the Beautiful South talks about his life in music performs a selection of his tracks

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor heads to Tokyo and checks out the Park Hyatt, the hotel featured in the film Lost in Translation, and goes behind the closed doors of the Japanese capitals love hotels. In the fashionable district of Meguro, Richard takes in the Claska, which was the citys first boutique hotel and has its own canine beauty salon

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant travels to Venice, said to be the city with the highest concentration of luxury hotels on the planet. He discovers how a measuring error led to the building of the citys biggest swimming pool, tries out a 15,000 euro-a-night royal suite whose bed has been slept in by everyone from the Beckhams to Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall, and visits a hotel that keeps its doors open even when water floods to knee height. He also finds out why breaking a window once earned Ernest Hemingway a 10 per cent discount on his room

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming examines the hidden histories of cities, revealing the sights and sounds rarely witnessed by the public. He begins in London at St Pauls Cathedral, where he visits a place tourists never go, before exploring a hidden park and a little-known church. He also gets a guided tour of Soho from broadcaster Danny Baker

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: As the third series of the sci-fi drama unfolds, the critical event that marked the end of the last season threatens to consume the outside world. Dolores develops a relationship with Caleb, and comes to learn how artificial beings are treated in the real world. Starring Evan Rachel Wood, Aaron Paul and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Maeve finds herself in a new park and meets a ghost from the past. Meanwhile, Bernard makes his way back to Westworld. Starring Evan Rachel Wood and Thandie Newton

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Charlotte grapples with reality, and Dolores and Caleb begin to form a key partnership. Starring Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Ed Harris and Aaron Paul continues

programme.title: Westworld

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Caleb is dosed with an unusual drug, and Dolores piles the pressure on Liam for access to Rehoboam. Starring Evan Rachel Wood and Thandiwe Newton

programme.title: Westworld

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Wall, which has protected the Seven Kingdoms for 8,000 years, has fallen, and the Night Kings army of the dead marches towards Westeros. Meanwhile, Jon and Daenerys arrive in Winterfell, and the Stark children are reunited. Starring Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms

Starring Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Night King and the army of the dead reach Winterfell, and an epic battle between the living and the dead begins. Starring Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Atomic
programme.desc: Max and JJ try to win back the uranium in Casablanca, but the pair face a choice as the cartel closes in. Action adventure, with Alfie Allen and Shazad Latif

programme.desc: Saxon gets work calls, so Timothy enforces a no-phone rule, Chelsea faces danger after going to town with Rick, and Jaclyn pushes Laurie toward Valentin

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Livias death forces Janice to return from Seattle to help organise the funeral, while Tony struggles to cope with a renewed onset of panic attacks as he reveals his true feelings about his bereavement to Dr Melfi. Drama, starring James Gandolfini and Aida Turturro

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Janice moves into her mothers house, Dr Melfi helps Tony probe his anxiety attacks, and Anthony Jr becomes the surprise star of his American football team. Gritty drama, starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Svetlana enlists Russian thugs in her conflict with Janice, and Ralph Cifaretto endears himself to Jackie Jr but loses points with Tony. Meanwhile, Dr Melfi is raped, but her attacker is freed on a technicality, leaving her facing a crisis of conscience. Gritty drama, starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Bobby Bacala Baccalieri Sr comes out of retirement, much to the annoyance of Uncle Junior, while Artie Bucco faces up to his feelings toward his wife and his hostess. Elsewhere, Carmela takes a more active role in Tonys therapy. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: A dancer having an affair with Ralph enrages him when she insults him, leading Tony to take retribution on her behalf. Meadow social life at college takes a sudden turn for the worse when her room-mate Caitlin antagonises her boyfriend. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Joe Pantoliano and Jamie-Lynn DiScala

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: During an awkward lunch with her publisher, Julia is unexpectedly inspired by an offhand comment from a well-respected chef. Starring Sarah Lancashire and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham hosts its annual Pirate Festival, paying tribute to Devons colourful maritime history, while fisherman Nathan sets off in search of a lucrative catch

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming tours the less-celebrated sights of Brighton, beginning by visiting the Toy and Model Museum to look at its collection of model trains. He then discovers a boutique that sells a variety of unusual items, before taking a glimpse behind the scenes at the Royal Pavilion

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores the history of Bristol, beginning by learning a grisly secret at the docks before meeting Mercury Prize-winning musician Roni Size to discuss life in the St Pauls and Stokes Croft areas of the city. He also explores the district of Clifton and visits a speakeasy-style bar

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Liverpool, cutting through cliches about football and the Beatles to explore its less-celebrated treasures. Among his destinations are a 1930s banking building that has remained unaltered since closing in 2007, a well-appointed set of toilets and a recording studio hidden in a bar. He also discovers which former dictator once spent Christmas in the city

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Bernard, Stubbs, and William escape from all the chaos. Meanwhile, Caleb gains an insight on the true nature of his past. Starring Evan Rachel Wood

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Dolores true intentions are finally revealed. Meanwhile, Bernard confronts a ghost from his past, and William faces an unexpected adversary

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Seven years after the demise of Rehoboam, events are set in motion that reunite allies and enemies. Starring Thandiwe Newton and Ed Harris

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Maeve and Caleb search for answers, Christina investigates Peter Myers, and William announces a new Delos venture

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: After the Battle of Winterfell, the Great War to gain control over the mythical land of Westeros continues as Jon and Daenerys look to the south. Meanwhile, Jon shares a secret with his siblings. Starring Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Varys betrays his queen, and Daenerys brings her forces to Kings Landing as the explosive final battle for the Iron Throne begins. Starring Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The final episode of the fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels. The Great War to gain control over the mythical land of Westeros continues. In the aftermath of the devastating battle at Kings Landing, Daenerys declares her intentions for Westeros, and Tyrion faces the consequences of his actions. Starring Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Eddard Stark is torn between his family and an old friend when he is asked to serve at the side of King Robert Baratheon. However, neither man is aware that their country is on the verge of a bitter power struggle that could lead to its destruction. First episode of the fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Sean Bean, Mark Addy, Lena Headey and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Bran clings to life as Ned prepares to head south with the king - only for the youngster to come under attack once more. Jon discovers a different side to Tyrion when he accompanies him on a journey to the Wall, while Daenerys becomes more assertive toward her new husband, the warlord Khal Drogo. Fantasy drama, starring Sean Bean, Mark Addy and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned finally takes up his role at the side of the king, but struggles to deal with the political power games of Roberts cunning advisers. The weary lord is asked to organise a tournament, but finds the royal finances in a dire state - and his job is made even harder by troubling news from home. Meanwhile, Tyrions visit to the Wall reveals the men of the Nights Watch are in desperate need of reinforcement, and relations between Daenerys and Viserys become increasingly strained. Fantasy drama, starring Sean Bean and Mark Addy

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As he prepares for an emotional court appearance, Tom buries himself in the case, while Emily questions her obligations to the family. Maeve makes a critical choice to protect her own loved ones, while Robbie works to find a way to turn his newfound surplus into cash

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: Hays recalls the early days of his romance with Amelia, and some of the cracks that began to show after they married and had children together. Back in the present day, ten years after the Purcell crimes took place, Hays is presented with a second chance to vindicate himself and the investigation

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Herc and Carver arrest a driver after witnessing him picking up a large amount of cash from known gang members, but are forced to return the money when the mans political connections to a senator are revealed. After his apartment is raided and van torched, Omar takes revenge in a street encounter with Wee-Bey and Stinkum

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Alex talks to Paul about Laura, and wonders whether the therapy sessions are having any real effect. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: Joel and Ellie continue with their journey to Wyoming, but end up drawing the attention of a vindictive rebel leader while driving through Kansas City

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Robbie and Cliff try to find a potential buyer, Tom and Grasso level with the Dark Hearts, and Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches former co-workers. Later, a raid leads Tom to a shocking revelation

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Kendall and the Waystar team find themselves working together at the annual shareholders meeting, where Logans health takes a turn. Starring Brian Cox and Jeremy Strong

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: As Sophie tries to recall the events immediately before her accident, Paul thinks he has made a breakthrough, but the session ends in disaster

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A neurotic worker ant passes himself off as a soldier to impress a princess. However, he provokes a jealously ambitious general with an accidental act of heroism - so he and his beloved decide to flee the brutal colony and go in search of the promised land of Insectopia. Animated comedy, with the voices of Woody Allen, Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman and Sylvester Stallone

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Inventor Wallace and his canine sidekick Gromit have set up a pest-control service, and are called in to stop rabbits overrunning a garden show. However, the pair are overwhelmed when a destructive giant bunny arrives on the scene, while an interfering aristocrat contrives to make matters worse. Nick Parks Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Peter Sallis, Ralph Fiennes and Helena Bonham Carter

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. However, the duo must put aside their differences and work together when they uncover a plot to sabotage the company their parents work for. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Jimmy Kimmel and Lisa Kudrow

programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a cars exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.desc: When their fiendish foes unite against them once more, Batman and Robin attempt to take them down. Animated adventure, with the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward and Julie Newmar, reprising their roles from the 1960s live action series

programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.desc: Kind-hearted village artist Lucas travels deep into the enchanted forest to locate a tree that bears a special insignia. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Natalka Denisenko, Artem Pyvovarov and Olena Kravets

Animated adventure based on the series of childrens books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

Fantasy drama, starring Warren Beatty, Julie Christie and James Mason

A slimy network executive offers them the chance to turn professional, but as they enjoy the perks of wealth and fame, they find their show being ruined by corporate interference. Comedy, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe, Tia Carrere and Lara Flynn Boyle, with a cameo by Alice Cooper

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Wisecracking Detroit detective Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles to investigate the shooting of an old friend, and uncovers a connection with a spate of violent robberies carried out by a criminal who leaves a mysterious calling card. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Brigitte Nielsen.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald OConnor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two dim-witted brothers dream of getting into the Roxbury, the most fashionable nightclub in Los Angeles, but get turned away every time. Happily, an incident with a movie star finally paves their way inside, only for them to end up the target of two gold-diggers who have mistaken the pair for wealthy businessmen. Comedy, with Will Ferrell and Chris Kattan

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rivals in the bookshop business fall in love over the internet, unaware they know and dislike each other in the real world. While things remain frosty in person, the pairs anonymous online relationship continues to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear, Parker Posey and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: The Cinema List: The 90s
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald OConnor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rivals in the bookshop business fall in love over the internet, unaware they know and dislike each other in the real world. While things remain frosty in person, the pairs anonymous online relationship continues to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear, Parker Posey and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleagues murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse

programme.title: I Dont Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous vacation. Comedic horror, starring Nick Kroll, Andrew Rannells and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burtons comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: A megalomaniac threatens to take over the world, so two married spies come out of retirement to thwart his plans. However, when they go missing, it is up to their plucky children to step in and save the day. Family adventure directed by Robert Rodriguez, starring Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino, Alan Cumming, Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A farm boy accidentally rebuilds the link between the human world and a kingdom of man-eating giants in the sky, resulting in a princess being trapped in the monsters realm. He joins a band of the kings knights on a rescue mission, but one of the group intends to betray them in a bid to seize the throne. Fantasy adventure, starring Nicholas Hoult and Ewan McGregor

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistresss evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrants rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Pregnant Mollie is dumped by her boyfriend, and sets out after the babys birth to find a surrogate father for her infant son Mikey, who comments on proceedings through a wisecracking inner monologue. Mikey is confident the cab driver who helped deliver him is the perfect man for the job - but his mother is less than convinced. Comedy, with John Travolta, Kirstie Alley and the voice of Bruce Willis

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit has the run of a farm and its vegetable patch when the owner unexpectedly dies. When a relative inherits the property, he strives to rid his land of the rabbit and his woodland friends - but his feelings for a nature-loving woman complicate the battle of wits with the animal kingdom. Family comedy based on Beatrix Potters stories, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Rose Byrne, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The pint-sized secret agents investigate a mad scientist who has meddled with powerful forces and created a host of bizarre mutant animals. However, the villain is not the only problem they have to face, as another pair of youngsters are determined to outshine them. Family adventure sequel, starring Antonio Banderas, Steve Buscemi and Carla Gugino

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in a parallel universe populated by magical and menacing characters. When her best friend becomes the latest in a long line of children to mysteriously vanish, she embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the dark secret behind their disappearance. Fantasy adventure based on Philip Pullmans novel Northern Lights, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig and Eva Green. Featuring the voices of Ian McKellen, Kristin Scott Thomas and Kathy Bates

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When a young girl is sent to live with her uncle on his remote country estate after her parents die, she discovers a magical garden. Director Marc Mundens adaptation of the classic Frances Hodgson Burnett tale, starring Colin Firth, Julie Walters and Dixie Egerickx

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A fisherman finds a friend in a lost penguin, and after taking the bird under his wing, he finds a new sense of joy. Director David Schurmanns drama inspired by a true story, starring Jean Reno and Adriana Barraza

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: A Jewish lawyer looking forward to his retirement is pressured by his ailing mother to organise one last family holiday. Fulfilling her wish means reuniting his grown-up children, who have all gone their separate ways and cannot stand each other. Comedy drama, starring Timothy Spall, Honor Blackman, James Callis and Rhona Mitra

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: In a fantasy world where a fairy godmother endows each newborn with a special attribute, baby Ella is given the unwelcome gift of obedience. While growing up, she is magically compelled to do anything she is told to, and her stepmother takes great delight in forcing the girl to obey her every whim. So Ella sets out on a quest to find her fairy godmother and get her to take back her unwanted birthright. Fantasy adventure, starring Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes, Minnie Driver and Joanna Lumley

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The pint-sized secret agents investigate a mad scientist who has meddled with powerful forces and created a host of bizarre mutant animals. However, the villain is not the only problem they have to face, as another pair of youngsters are determined to outshine them. Family adventure sequel, starring Antonio Banderas, Steve Buscemi and Carla Gugino

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistresss evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrants rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit has the run of a farm and its vegetable patch when the owner unexpectedly dies. When a relative inherits the property, he strives to rid his land of the rabbit and his woodland friends - but his feelings for a nature-loving woman complicate the battle of wits with the animal kingdom. Family comedy based on Beatrix Potters stories, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Rose Byrne, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in a parallel universe populated by magical and menacing characters. When her best friend becomes the latest in a long line of children to mysteriously vanish, she embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the dark secret behind their disappearance. Fantasy adventure based on Philip Pullmans novel Northern Lights, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig and Eva Green. Featuring the voices of Ian McKellen, Kristin Scott Thomas and Kathy Bates

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leaders plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Childrens fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Young agent Juni has to go it alone when his big sister Carmen is kidnapped by the evil Toymaker, forcing the plucky junior spy to infiltrate the villains virtual reality world to rescue her. Adventure sequel, starring Daryl Sabara, Alexa Vega, Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, Ricardo Montalban, George Clooney, Steve Buscemi, Salma Hayek and Elijah Wood

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britains leading spy following the assassination of all the countrys other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jacksons alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. Its the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starring Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande-Butera, Jonathan Bailey, Michelle Yeoh and Jeff Goldblum

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: The globe-trotting archaeologist teams up with a rebellious teenager who draws him into a search in the Amazon jungle for a mysterious artefact of untold power. But their quest is hindered by Soviet agents who also want the fabled object for a more sinister purpose. Action adventure sequel, starring Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf, Ray Winstone and John Hurt

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Ruler of the Persian empire and self-proclaimed god Xerxes continues his campaign to crush the emerging Greek nation, forcing a general from the democratic city state of Athens to lead his navy into battle against Xerxes vast armada. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green and Lena Headey

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

But their quest is hindered by Soviet agents who also want the fabled object for a more sinister purpose. Action adventure sequel, starring Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf, Ray Winstone and John Hurt

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: News of a friends murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian OConner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: In AD 33 Jerusalem, non-believer Clarence hatches a scheme to pose as a messiah as he approaches the 30-day deadline imposed by sadistic loan shark Jedediah the Terrible. News spreads of Clarences powers of healing, which may spare him Jedediahs blade, but condemn him to crucifixion at the hands of a preening Pontius Pilate. Comedy, starring LaKeith Stanfield, Omar Sy, RJ Cyler, Eric Kofi-Abrefa and James McAvoy

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed. Horror starring Tanner Stine and Kaylee Kaneshiro

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latters boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Nosferatu

Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark OConnors thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: Helm Hammerhand sits on the throne of Rohan, flanked by sons Hama and Haleth and rebellious daughter Hera. Dunlending lord Freca proposes a marital union between Hera and his son Wulf, which Helm loudly rejects. In a subsequent brawl between fathers, Helm unintentionally lands a fatal blow, so Wulf vows revenge and amasses an army led by General Targg. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gaia Wise, Brian Cox, Luke Pasqualino and Lorraine Ashbourne

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Love Hurts

programme.title: Wolf Man

Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer attempts to destroy vampires in a small American town. Horror based on Stephen Kings novel of the same name, starring Lewis Pullman, Makenzie Leigh, Jordan Preston Carter and Alfre Woodard

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045, gamers explore a virtual world in the quest for a deceased tycoons fortune. However, they must also contend with an evil corporation who will stop at nothing to get their hands on the prize. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Ernest Clines novel, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn, Simon Pegg and Mark Rylance

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Four decades ago, Michael Myers terrorised the town of Haddonfield, Illinois and went on a killing spree, 15 years after murdering his sister. After a prison bus crashes, the killer is back in the wild, but survivor Laurie Strode is ready for his return. Director David Gordon Greens horror sequel based on John Carpenters much imitated 1978 namesake movie, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Judy Greer and Andi Matichak

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: A 19th-century widow must make an unimaginable choice when, during a cruel winter, a foreign ship sinks off the coast of her fishing village. Horror mystery, starring Odessa Young, Joe Cole, Siobhan Finneran and Rory McCann

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer attempts to destroy vampires in a small American town. Horror based on Stephen Kings novel of the same name, starring Lewis Pullman, Makenzie Leigh, Jordan Preston Carter and Alfre Woodard

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earths core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planets surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek
